dc.title: USDA-ARS TEAM Leafy Spurge
dc.description: The work of TEAM Leafy Spurge, a USDA-ARS five-year, integrated pest management research and demonstration project focusing on the biological, chemical and cultural control of the noxious weed leafy spurge, is featured along with additional information in this comprehensive site.
